title: 88/101/EEC: Commission Decision of 12 January 1988 approving a programme for the fresh fruit and vegetables sector concerning storage and packaging in Portugal pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 12 January 1988
approving a programme for the fresh fruit and vegetables sector concerning storage and packaging in Portugal pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
(88/101/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme for the storage and packaging of fresh fruit, vegetables and potatoes forwarded by the Portuguese Government on 20 July 1987 and for which additional information was provided on 10 November 1987 pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 is approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Portuguese Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 January 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 51, 23. 2. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 57, 27. 2. 1987, p. 6.
